translations: 超过，胜过，优于；比（预期的或希望的）更好；超越自我；超出（理解范围）

sentences.sentence: He was determined to surpass the achievements of his older brothers.
sentences.translation: 他决心超过他的几位哥哥的成就。

sentences.sentence: With such progress, Google's cars will easily surpass my own driving ability later this year.
sentences.translation: 有了这样的进步，谷歌汽车的驾驶能力将在今年晚些时候轻松超越我自己的车技。

sentences.sentence: It showed such children surpass youngsters from richer backgrounds—even those who could use computers.
sentences.translation: 调查显示，这些孩子超越了来自富裕家庭的孩子，甚至超过了那些会使用电脑的孩子。
